title: RECRUITING people for 5 man solo que in season 6!!(Teamranked)
body:
Hello guys,

since you are here. you probably already have red the topic and know what this is about.
Yes, we are looking for people who will play together with us 5 man solo que in Season 6 and(eventually also teamrankeds.. we can decide this later)
Anyway, I will now list the requirements for being a member of this group which already consists of 2-3 members.

1.First of all: Need to be able to speak and unterstand english(no need for perfect english (we are germans))
2.ELO: HIGH Plat, Diamond or higher
3.Communication programms: Skype(Optional), (Teamspeak)
4.ATTITUDE: Willing to improve and accept criticism, being serious, concentrate, motivated, no flame -no hate
5.ACTIVE: We  do not want members who play once a week
6.Skill: Do not be a ebay boy :/
7. Champion Pool: No one trick pony 
8. Being able play on 2 or mroe lanes
9.EXPERIENCE

So those are the requirements, and now i will tell you something about us and our goals.

Currently consisting of 2-3 Members.
High Plat-Diamond
Roles:Mid/supp/adc/jungle/top
Intentions: Creating a good group to climb up the ranks(solo and maybe ranked teams)

Goal: Reach High Diamond-Master

If you got further questions just add me in game ;) "An1M3Tony"(yes it is ANIME)
Or "Balancebreak". Or just leave a comment here.

I hope to see you soon so we can climb up the ladders together ;)!!!
